sed -e "s:HOME:<DATASET>:g" -e "s:DFILE:Sample123.train:g"  -e "s:RFILE:Sample4.test:g" -e "s:OUTPUTFOLDER:F123-4:g"  -e "s:CONTENTBASEDF:<CONTENTBASEDF>:g" -e "s:NUMFIELDS:<NUMFIELDS>:g" -e "s:STARTINGFIELD:<STARTINGFIELD>:g" -e "s:<numThreads>0</numThreads>:<numThreads><CORES></numThreads>:g" -e "s:<doItem />:<doUser />:g" <RUN>/config_empty_index.xml > <TEMP_XML_FILE>.Sample123-4.temp.xml
sed -e "s:HOME:<DATASET>:g" -e "s:DFILE:Sample123.train:g"  -e "s:RFILE:Sample5.test:g" -e "s:OUTPUTFOLDER:F123-5:g"  -e "s:CONTENTBASEDF:<CONTENTBASEDF>:g" -e "s:NUMFIELDS:<NUMFIELDS>:g" -e "s:STARTINGFIELD:<STARTINGFIELD>:g" -e "s:<numThreads>0</numThreads>:<numThreads><CORES></numThreads>:g" -e "s:<doItem />:<doUser />:g" <RUN>/config_empty_index.xml > <TEMP_XML_FILE>.Sample123-5.temp.xml
